I also look forward to working with him in our efforts to address our ports, waterways, and other water resources infrastructure; a federal pipeline safety program reauthorization; and a bill to provide the US Coast Guard with the resources necessary to carry out its missions. Congressman Van Drew will also help the Committee as we work to improve continuing supply chain and domestic energy issues."

This administration has no plan to secure our border & has refused to enforce our rule of law. We are witnessing an intensifying situation at our border and after Title 42 ends, the invasion will only get worse. House Republicans, once again, are the only ones with a plan. [[url]]

This Republican-led bill is the House delivering on its promises to hold the Chinese Communist Party accountable and reverse this administration's policies that threaten our national security. Without this legislation in place, this administration will continue to sell our reserves to adversaries.
